wordGroup: seedling nursery 苗圃；播种苗圃

sentences.en: Keep the soil moist. That way, the seedling will flourish.
sentences.cn: 保持土壤湿润,那样小苗就会茁壮成长。

sentences.en: Otherwise, it would be unable to grow from a seedling.
sentences.cn: 否则，它的幼苗将无法生长。

sentences.en: When the birds forget to retrieve their food—and they do sometimes—a seedling has a chance to grow.
sentences.cn: 当鸟儿忘记取回食物时——它们有时会这样——幼苗就有机会生长。
